verses.verse: Abimelech <S%H40><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to Shechem <S%H7927><s%> to his mother <S%H517><s%>'s brothers, <S%H251><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> with them, <S%H4940><s%> and with all the family of the house <S%H1004><s%> of his mother <S%H517><s%>'s father, <S%H1><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Please speak <S%H1696><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of all the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> <S%H2896><s%> 'Is it better for you that all the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal, <S%H3378><s%> who are seventy <S%H7657><s%> persons, <S%H376><s%> rule <S%H4910><s%> over you, <S%H259><s%> or that one rule <S%H4910><s%> over you? <S%H2142><s%>' Remember also that I am your bone <S%H6106><s%> and your flesh. <S%H1320><s%>"

His mother <S%H517><s%>'s brothers <S%H251><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> of him in the ears <S%H241><s%> of all the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> all these words: <S%H1697><s%> and their hearts <S%H3820><s%> inclined <S%H5186><s%> to follow <S%H310><s%> Abimelech; <S%H40><s%> for they said, <S%H559><s%> "He is our brother. <S%H251><s%>"

They gave <S%H5414><s%> him seventy <S%H7657><s%> pieces of silver <S%H3701><s%> out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Baal Berith, <S%H1170><s%> with which Abimelech <S%H40><s%> hired <S%H7936><s%> vain <S%H7386><s%> and light <S%H6348><s%> fellows, <S%H582><s%> who followed <S%H3212><s%> him. <S%H310><s%>

He went <S%H935><s%> to his father <S%H1><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> at Ophrah, <S%H6084><s%> and killed <S%H2026><s%> his brothers <S%H251><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal, <S%H3378><s%> being seventy <S%H7657><s%> persons, <S%H376><s%> on one <S%H259><s%> stone: <S%H68><s%> but Jotham <S%H3147><s%> the youngest <S%H6996><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> was left; <S%H3498><s%> for he hid himself. <S%H2244><s%>

All the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> assembled themselves together, <S%H622><s%> and all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Millo, <S%H4407><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> and made <S%H4427><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%> king, <S%H4428><s%> by the oak <S%H436><s%> of the pillar <S%H5324><s%> that was in Shechem. <S%H7927><s%>

When they told <S%H5046><s%> it to Jotham, <S%H3147><s%> he went <S%H3212><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> on the top <S%H7218><s%> of Mount <S%H2022><s%> Gerizim, <S%H1630><s%> and lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his voice, <S%H6963><s%> and cried, <S%H7121><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H8085><s%> "Listen to me, <S%H1167><s%> you men of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> may listen to you. <S%H8085><s%>

The trees <S%H6086><s%> went forth <S%H1980><s%> on a time to anoint <S%H4886><s%> a king <S%H4428><s%> over them; <S%H559><s%> and they said to the olive tree, <S%H2132><s%> <S%H4427><s%> 'Reign over us.'

"But the olive tree <S%H2132><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H2308><s%> 'Should I leave my fatness, <S%H1880><s%> with which by me they honor <S%H3513><s%> God <S%H430><s%> and man, <S%H582><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> to wave <S%H5128><s%> back and forth over the trees? <S%H6086><s%>'
"The trees <S%H6086><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the fig tree, <S%H8384><s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'Come and reign over us. <S%H4427><s%>'

"But the fig tree <S%H8384><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H2308><s%> 'Should I leave my sweetness, <S%H4987><s%> and my good <S%H2896><s%> fruit, <S%H8570><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> to wave <S%H5128><s%> back and forth over the trees? <S%H6086><s%>'
"The trees <S%H6086><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the vine, <S%H1612><s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'Come and reign over us. <S%H4427><s%>'

"The vine <S%H1612><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H2308><s%> 'Should I leave my new wine, <S%H8492><s%> which cheers <S%H8055><s%> God <S%H430><s%> and man, <S%H582><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> to wave <S%H5128><s%> back and forth over the trees? <S%H6086><s%>'
"Then all the trees <S%H6086><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the bramble, <S%H329><s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'Come and reign over us. <S%H4427><s%>'

"The bramble <S%H329><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the trees, <S%H6086><s%> <S%H571><s%> 'If in truth you anoint <S%H4886><s%> me king <S%H4428><s%> over you, <S%H935><s%> then come and take refuge <S%H2620><s%> in my shade; <S%H6738><s%> and if not, <S%H784><s%> let fire come out <S%H3318><s%> of the bramble, <S%H329><s%> and devour <S%H398><s%> the cedars <S%H730><s%> of Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%>'

"Now therefore, <S%H6213><s%> if you have dealt truly <S%H571><s%> and righteously, <S%H8549><s%> in that you have made Abimelech <S%H40><s%> king, <S%H4427><s%> and if you have dealt <S%H6213><s%> well <S%H2896><s%> with Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> and his house, <S%H1004><s%> and have done <S%H6213><s%> to him according to the deserving <S%H1576><s%> of his hands <S%H3027><s%>

(for my father <S%H1><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> for you, <S%H7993><s%> and risked his life, <S%H5315><s%> <S%H5048><s%> and delivered <S%H5337><s%> you out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Midian: <S%H4080><s%>

and you have risen up <S%H6965><s%> against my father <S%H1><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> this day, <S%H3117><s%> and have slain <S%H2026><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> persons, <S%H376><s%> on one <S%H259><s%> stone, <S%H68><s%> and have made Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of his female servant, <S%H519><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> over the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> because he is your brother <S%H251><s%>);

if you then have dealt <S%H6213><s%> truly <S%H571><s%> and righteously <S%H8549><s%> with Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> and with his house <S%H1004><s%> this day, <S%H3117><s%> then rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> and let him also rejoice in you: <S%H8055><s%>

but if not, <S%H784><s%> let fire come out <S%H3318><s%> from Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> and devour <S%H398><s%> the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Millo; <S%H4407><s%> and let fire <S%H784><s%> come out <S%H3318><s%> from the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> and from the house <S%H1004><s%> of Millo, <S%H4407><s%> and devour <S%H398><s%> Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>"

Jotham <S%H3147><s%> ran away, <S%H1272><s%> and fled, <S%H5127><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> to Beer, <S%H876><s%> and lived <S%H3427><s%> there, <S%H6440><s%> for fear of Abimelech <S%H40><s%> his brother. <S%H251><s%>
Abimelech <S%H40><s%> was prince <S%H7786><s%> over Israel <S%H3478><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> an evil <S%H7451><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> between Abimelech <S%H40><s%> and the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem; <S%H7927><s%> and the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> dealt treacherously <S%H898><s%> with Abimelech: <S%H40><s%>

that the violence <S%H2555><s%> done to the seventy <S%H7657><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> might come, <S%H935><s%> and that their blood <S%H1818><s%> might be laid <S%H7760><s%> on Abimelech <S%H40><s%> their brother, <S%H251><s%> who killed <S%H2026><s%> them, <S%H1167><s%> and on the men of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> who strengthened <S%H2388><s%> his hands to kill <S%H2026><s%> his brothers. <S%H251><s%>

The men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> an ambush <S%H693><s%> for him on the tops <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and they robbed <S%H1497><s%> all who came <S%H5674><s%> along that way <S%H1870><s%> by them: <S%H5046><s%> and it was told Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>

Gaal <S%H1603><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed <S%H5651><s%> came <S%H935><s%> with his brothers, <S%H251><s%> and went over <S%H5674><s%> to Shechem; <S%H7927><s%> and the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> put their trust in him. <S%H982><s%>

They went out <S%H3318><s%> into the field, <S%H7704><s%> and harvested <S%H1219><s%> their vineyards, <S%H3754><s%> and trod <S%H1869><s%> the grapes, <S%H6213><s%> and held festival, <S%H1974><s%> and went <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of their god, <S%H430><s%> and ate <S%H398><s%> and drank, <S%H8354><s%> and cursed <S%H7043><s%> Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>

Gaal <S%H1603><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed <S%H5651><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Who is Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> and who is Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> that we should serve <S%H5647><s%> him? <S%H1121><s%> Isn't he the son of Jerubbaal? <S%H3378><s%> and Zebul <S%H2083><s%> his officer? <S%H6496><s%> Serve <S%H5647><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> of Hamor <S%H2544><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Shechem: <S%H7927><s%> but why should we serve him? <S%H5647><s%>

Would that this people <S%H5971><s%> were under <S%H5414><s%> my hand! <S%H3027><s%> Then I would remove <S%H5493><s%> Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>" He said <S%H559><s%> to Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> "Increase <S%H7235><s%> your army, <S%H6635><s%> and come out! <S%H3318><s%>"

When Zebul <S%H2083><s%> the ruler <S%H8269><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of Gaal <S%H1603><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed, <S%H5651><s%> his anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled. <S%H2734><s%>

He sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to Abimelech <S%H40><s%> craftily, <S%H8649><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H1603><s%> Gaal the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed <S%H5651><s%> and his brothers <S%H251><s%> have come <S%H935><s%> to Shechem; <S%H7927><s%> and behold, <S%H6696><s%> they incite the city against you. <S%H5892><s%>
Now therefore, <S%H6965><s%> go up by night, <S%H3915><s%> you and the people <S%H5971><s%> who are with you, <S%H693><s%> and lie in wait in the field: <S%H7704><s%>

and it shall be, <S%H1242><s%> that in the morning, as soon as the sun <S%H8121><s%> is up, <S%H2224><s%> you shall rise early, <S%H7925><s%> and rush on the city; <S%H5892><s%> and behold, <S%H5971><s%> when he and the people who are with him come out <S%H3318><s%> against you, <S%H3027><s%> then may you do <S%H6213><s%> to them as you <S%H3027><s%> shall find occasion. <S%H4672><s%>"

Abimelech <S%H40><s%> rose up, <S%H6965><s%> and all the people <S%H5971><s%> who were with him, <S%H3915><s%> by night, and they laid wait <S%H693><s%> against Shechem <S%H7927><s%> in four <S%H702><s%> companies. <S%H7218><s%>

Gaal <S%H1603><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebed <S%H5651><s%> went out, <S%H3318><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> in the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the city: <S%H5892><s%> and Abimelech <S%H40><s%> rose up, <S%H6965><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> who were with him, <S%H3993><s%> from the ambush.

When Gaal <S%H1603><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> he said <S%H559><s%> to Zebul, <S%H2083><s%> "Behold, <S%H5971><s%> people are coming <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from the tops <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains. <S%H2022><s%>" Zebul <S%H2083><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H7200><s%> "You see the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%> as if they were men. <S%H582><s%>"

Gaal <S%H1603><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> and said, <S%H1696><s%> "Behold, <S%H5971><s%> people are coming <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> by the middle <S%H2872><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> and one company <S%H7218><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> by the way of <S%H1870><s%> the oak <S%H436><s%> of <S%H1870><s%> Meonenim. <S%H6049><s%>"

Then Zebul <S%H2083><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H645><s%> "Now where is your mouth, <S%H6310><s%> that you said, <S%H559><s%> <S%H40><s%> 'Who is Abimelech, that we should serve <S%H5647><s%> him? <S%H5971><s%>' Isn't this the people that you have despised? <S%H3988><s%> Please go out <S%H3318><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> and fight with them. <S%H3898><s%>"
Gaal <S%H1603><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the men <S%H1167><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> with Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>

Abimelech <S%H40><s%> chased <S%H7291><s%> him, <S%H5127><s%> and he fled before <S%H6440><s%> him, <S%H7227><s%> and many fell <S%H5307><s%> wounded, <S%H2491><s%> even to the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the gate. <S%H8179><s%>

Abimelech <S%H40><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> at Arumah: <S%H725><s%> and Zebul <S%H2083><s%> drove out <S%H1644><s%> Gaal <S%H1603><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> that they should not dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Shechem. <S%H7927><s%>
It happened on the next day, <S%H4283><s%> that the people <S%H5971><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> into the field; <S%H7704><s%> and they told <S%H5046><s%> Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>

He took <S%H3947><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> and divided <S%H2673><s%> them into three <S%H7969><s%> companies, <S%H7218><s%> and laid wait <S%H693><s%> in the field; <S%H7704><s%> and he looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H5971><s%> the people came forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the city; <S%H5892><s%> He rose up <S%H6965><s%> against them, <S%H5221><s%> and struck them.

Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> and the companies <S%H7218><s%> that were with him, <S%H6584><s%> rushed forward, and stood <S%H5975><s%> in the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the city: <S%H5892><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> companies <S%H7218><s%> rushed on <S%H6584><s%> all who were in the field, <S%H7704><s%> and struck them. <S%H5221><s%>

Abimelech <S%H40><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> against the city <S%H5892><s%> all that day; <S%H3117><s%> and he took <S%H3920><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> and killed <S%H2026><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> who were therein: <S%H5422><s%> and he beat down the city, <S%H5892><s%> and sowed <S%H2232><s%> it with salt. <S%H4417><s%>

When all the men <S%H1167><s%> of the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> of it, <S%H935><s%> they entered into the stronghold <S%H6877><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of <S%H410><s%> Elberith. <S%H1286><s%>
It was told <S%H5046><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%> that all the men <S%H1167><s%> of the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> were gathered together. <S%H6908><s%>

Abimelech <S%H40><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Zalmon, <S%H6756><s%> he and all the people <S%H5971><s%> who were with him; <S%H40><s%> and Abimelech took <S%H3947><s%> an axe <S%H7134><s%> in his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and cut down <S%H3772><s%> a bough <S%H7754><s%> from the trees, <S%H6086><s%> and took <S%H5375><s%> it up, <S%H7760><s%> and laid it on his shoulder: <S%H7926><s%> and he said <S%H559><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> who were with him, <S%H7200><s%> "What you have seen me do, <S%H6213><s%> make haste, <S%H4116><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> as I have done! <S%H3644><s%>"

All the people <S%H5971><s%> likewise each <S%H376><s%> cut down <S%H3772><s%> his bough, <S%H7754><s%> and followed <S%H3212><s%> Abimelech, <S%H40><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> them at the base of the stronghold, <S%H6877><s%> and set <S%H3341><s%> the stronghold <S%H6877><s%> on fire <S%H784><s%> on them; <S%H582><s%> so that all the people of the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> also, <S%H505><s%> about a thousand men <S%H376><s%> and women. <S%H802><s%>
Then went <S%H3212><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%> to Thebez, <S%H8405><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> against Thebez, <S%H8405><s%> and took it. <S%H3920><s%>

But there was a strong <S%H5797><s%> tower <S%H4026><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> and there fled <S%H5127><s%> all the men <S%H582><s%> and women, <S%H802><s%> and all they <S%H1167><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> and shut <S%H5462><s%> themselves in, <S%H5927><s%> and went up to the roof <S%H1406><s%> of the tower. <S%H4026><s%>

Abimelech <S%H40><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to the tower, <S%H4026><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> against it, <S%H5066><s%> and drew near to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tower <S%H4026><s%> to burn <S%H8313><s%> it with fire. <S%H784><s%>

A certain <S%H259><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> cast <S%H7993><s%> an upper <S%H6400><s%> millstone <S%H7393><s%> on Abimelech <S%H40><s%>'s head, <S%H7218><s%> and broke <S%H7533><s%> his skull. <S%H1538><s%>

Then he called <S%H7121><s%> hastily <S%H4120><s%> to the young man <S%H5288><s%> his armor bearer, <S%H5375><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H8025><s%> "Draw your sword, <S%H2719><s%> and kill <S%H4191><s%> me, <S%H559><s%> that men not say of me, <S%H802><s%> 'A woman killed <S%H2026><s%> him. <S%H5288><s%>' His young man thrust him through, <S%H1856><s%> and he died. <S%H4191><s%>"
